column4: i can't "smb" to my windows shares on my other machines, there were working last week
the window share on one of my machines that i am troubleshoot is still shared
i did this in a console : smb://computername/share
does your ubuntu machine have a static ip?
I canfigured my computers to all look at one as the WINS server to get the names.  I'm not sure how to do this manually.  I use
then again i just checked my "wired" connection is DHCP
I read somewhere that you have to set your ubuntu machines to static IP if you don't have wins server.  Webmin is for linux.
All that being said, I still use the IP addresses to mount shares in fstab.
